questions.text: Which of the following is the correct social platform, as depicted in Figure 1?
Which of the following statement(s) is/are true about Anonymous social networks?
options: Content posted on Anonymous Social is not connected with particular online identities or profiles
Anonymous social networks might ask for log-in details and sync your contact details to personalise the user experience
Anonymous social networks help build a professional network and seek a job
questions.correctAnswer: Content posted on Anonymous Social is not connected with particular online identities or profiles | Anonymous social networks might ask for log-in details and sync your contact details to personalise the user experience

questions.text:
What is the output of the response variable in the below code: 
 import requests 
 response=requests.get("https://precog.iiit.ac.in/")
Which platform uses a bidirectional (“mutual”) connection model?
What does Value specify in 5Vs on Social Media?
options: Confirmation of the information posted as legitimate
Data can be obtained from many different sources
Ability to get value out of the platform
questions.correctAnswer: Ability to get value out of the platform

questions.text: Which one of the following is an example of shoulder surfing?
options: Mail claiming that your system has been infected or the account has been breached
Someone sees your password standing behind you while you type without letting you know.
Emails that claim you’ve won a prize and require you to go on a link
questions.correctAnswer: Someone sees your password standing behind you while you type without letting you know.

questions.text: You have two files in the folder: " privacy.py” and “security.py”. Now you want to command to stage the privacy.py file and commit. Which of the following option are correct?
options: git add privacy.py git commit -m "Commit message"
questions.correctAnswer: git add privacy.py git commit -m "Commit message"

questions.text: Which of the following statements is/are true?
options: Python is a language that can be used to draw network graphs.
Python Functions do not have restrictions on the type of the argument and the type of its return value.
questions.correctAnswer: Python is a language that can be used to draw network graphs. | It is an interpreted language. | Python Functions do not have restrictions on the type of the argument and the type of its return value.

questions.text: Match the following. Choose the most appropriate option.

Choose the incorrect option about ephemeral content. 
 (i) Instagram Stories are a type of ephemeral content. 
 (ii) Ephemeral content helps in generating more user-generated content.
